.b-sch-event.title: Drag or resize me
.b-sch-event.content: Changes are saved automatically when autoSync is enabled

[data-ref='addButton'].title: Add time range or resource time range
[data-ref='addButton'].content: Click and pick from the menu. Ranges can be edited using the custom context menu

[data-ref='autoSyncButton'].title: Automatic synchronization of changes
[data-ref='autoSyncButton'].content: Click to turn it off, and instead sync manually using the Sync button
